rrdworld.name: rrd.cgi
rrdworld.author: Haroon Rafique
rrdworld.description: rrd.cgi is an on-demand, highly configurable perl front-end for rrdtool. It supports, unlimited DEFs, CDEFs, hourly/daily/weekly/montly/yearly graphs, auto-archival of graphs, historical graphs, displaying source of RRDs::graph statements and autorefresh. rrd.cgi runs under cgi-bin or mod_perl.
